abstract: Justice Dept is investigating fatal shooting in September 2014 of Darrien Hunt, who was black, by white police officers in Utah.
lead_paragraph: The United States Department of Justice is investigating a fatal shooting by the police of a man who was wielding a samurai sword.

headline.main: Utah: U.S. Reviews Killing of Man Wielding Sword
headline.print_headline: Utah: U.S. Reviews Killing of Man Wielding Sword
